title: This $70,000 Water Cooled Beast - HOLY $H!T
description:
Power through work more efficiently and confidently with the help of Grammarly. It’s free, why not?! Go to https://grammarly.com/LTT to sign up for a FREE account and get 20% off Grammarly Premium!

Configure your dream AX server without a setup fee with Hetzner at
http://linustechtips.hetzner.com/en/seasonsspecial-0822

Want to render something super fast? Well EK just released a water cooled server that can do just that.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1452079-this-70000-water-cooled-beast/

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE: https://www.floatplane.com/ltt
► AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS: https://lmg.gg/sponsors
► PODCAST GEAR: https://lmg.gg/podcastgear

Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0 https://geni.us/mj6pHk4
Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0 https://geni.us/Ps3XfE

CHAPTERS
---------------------------------------------------
0:00 - The God Slayer
0:27 - Hetzner!
0:40 - LTT Theme
0:50 - Unboxing a $70,000 computer XD
3:25 - Tour of the insides
6:13 - Quick swappable water cooling?
9:19 - Flow layout
10:31 - Fan controller
11:19 - Tubing, pumps, power, drives
14:33 - USB header troubles
15:43 - Reassemble, powering on
17:56 - Benchmarking
25:43 - Thermals, power supply redundancy
28:02 - Grammarly
29:07 - Outro
